src:
Aji Santoso Nilai Stadion GBT Layak Jadi Venue Piala Dunia U-20
06 Nov 2019, 21:03 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso menilai Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo (GBT), Surabaya layak menjadi venue Piala Dunia U-20 2021. Apalagi, jika ada pembenahan di beberapa sisi.
Hal itu diungkapkan Aji ketika memimpin latihan Persebaya untuk pertama kalinya di Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo, Surabaya, Rabu (6/11/2019) sore.
"Kalau saya bilang stadion ini cukup bagus, kalau memang ada sedikit perubahan untuk piala dunia ini sangat layak," kata Aji Santoso.
"Makanya kita sebagai warga Surabaya termasuk saya warga Surabaya, mari kita menjaga sama-sama stadion kebanggaan warga Surabaya," imbaunya.
Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo memang menjadi satu dari sepuluh stadion yang disiapkan untuk Piala Dunia U-20. Rencananya akan dilakukan pemugaran di stadion milik Pemkot Surabaya itu.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Aji Santoso GBT Stadium Value Worth Being A U-20 World Cup Venue
Nov 6, 2019, 21:03 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya coach, Aji Santoso, assesses that the Gelora Bung Tomo Stadium (GBT), Surabaya is worthy of being a 2021 U-20 World Cup venue. Moreover, if there are improvements on several sides.
This was revealed by Aji when leading Persebaya training for the first time at the Bung Tomo Gelora Stadium, Surabaya, Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon.
"If I say this stadium is pretty good, if there is indeed a slight change to the world cup it is very feasible," said Aji Santoso.
"So we as Surabaya citizens, including I am a Surabaya citizen, let's keep the stadium proud of the citizens of Surabaya," he urged.
Bung Tomo Gelora Stadium has indeed become one of ten stadiums prepared for the U-20 World Cup. The plan will be carried out restoration in the stadium owned by the Surabaya City Government.
